text:
After competing a fresh install of gentoo 2.6.25 r6 and following the directions on http://gentoo-wiki.com/Apache2_Install, i seem have a problem with the http daemon.  

Apache starts without error, will not serve web pages and when stopped gives this error  "httpd (no pid file) not running".  Firefox gives this error - "Error Code 10061: Connection refused"
creator: angophora@gmail.com

text: So your httpd did not start. As Bugzilla is no user support forum, but for reporting bugs please ask your question on the users mailinglist. If it really turns out to be a bug please come back here and reopen the report.
creator: rpluem@apache.org
rpluem@apache.org
text: User lists can be found at http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users
